scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js && php phing-latest.phar
scripts.build-css: sass assets/css/dev/style.scss assets/css/style.css --style compressed && sass assets/css/dev/public-style.scss assets/css/public-style.css --style compressed
scripts.build-js: terser assets/js/dev/*.js --output assets/js/script.js --compress --mangle --toplevel && terser assets/js/dev/public.js --output assets/js/public-script.js --compress --mangle --toplevel
